Interface org.doit.muffin.RedirectFilter

public interface RedirectFilter
extends Filter
Author:
Mark Boyns

needsRedirection(Request)
Specify whether or not this filter is interested in redirecting this request.
redirect(Request)
Return the URL location where the request should be redirected or null for no redirection.

needsRedirection 
 public abstract boolean needsRedirection(Request request)
Specify whether or not this filter is interested in redirecting this request.

Parameters:
request - the request
redirect 
 public abstract String redirect(Request request)
Return the URL location where the request should be redirected or null for no redirection.

Parameters:
request - the request
